rawcss-desc: Allows for the transclusion of Less and CSS into pages
action-editrawcss: create and edit raw CSS in the {{ns:RawCSS}} namespace
right-editrawcss: Create and edit raw CSS in the {{ns:RawCSS}} namespace
rawcss-tag-invalid-ref: RawCSS: ref attribute is invalid ($1 does not exist in [[{{ns:MediaWiki}}:RawCSS-applications]])
rawcss-tag-invalid-src: RawCSS: src attribute is invalid ($1 does not exist or does not have correct content model)
rawcss-tag-invalid-vars: RawCSS: vars attribute is invalid ($1 does not exist or does not have correct content model)
rawcss-tag-parsing-exception: RawCSS: could not parse the combination of $1 (src) and $2 (vars), check your variables
rawcss-page-error-category-desc: Pages which contain invalid RawCSS parser tags
